project_abstract.cdata: The First Transport Project will help the Government implement improved institutional structures and management techniques for the transport sector.  There are five project objectives : 1) support the Government's efforts to restructure the transport sector; 2) introduce more efficient internal management systems and maintenance procedures; 3) train managers in modern management techniques; 4) increase competition in the transport sector; and 5) improve the economic, financial and operating performance of the state railways.  The project comprises four main components : a) repair and modernization of equipment and facilities for railway rolling stock, track maintenance and signaling and telecommunications; b) measurement and laboratory equipment for maintenance and repair of the highway network; c) technical assistance to introduce an improved management information system ( MIS ) and to investigate long term strategic issues in the sector; and d) training for senior managers of sector institutions.
